titles.title: To exclude the first $75,000 of the value of retirement plans (adjusted annually for cost of living) in determining eligibility for, and the amount of benefits under, the supplemental security income program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Income Security and Family Support.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 9/27/2007--Introduced. Amends title XVI (Supplemental Security Income) of the Social Security Act to exclude the first $75,000 of the value of retirement plans (adjusted annually for cost of living) in determining eligibility for, and the amount of benefits under, the SSI program.
